## Source: ossf-package-analysis (f4a4cea0f7210535e002b329fb3bd7a547d17cac3f0db1831009855d61000a0a)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'solhint-plugin-openzeppelin' @ 99.99.99 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
